text: Sesario Sigam (born 17 October 1981), is a retired Micronesian footballer who played as a midfielder. ==International career== Sigam represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
